Last connection to the OurGroceries server was %s.
There has not been a connection to the OurGroceries server since this app was launched.
If you enjoy OurGroceries, get rid of ads for your whole household and support development!
Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy ad-free OurGroceries!
Connections are attempted automatically every %d seconds.
You have a yearly OurGroceries subscription on Google Play. Tap the button below to cancel your subscription.
Your OurGroceries account has been deleted.
You have a monthly OurGroceries subscription on Google Play. Tap the button below to cancel your subscription.
You have an OurGroceries subscription on Google Play. Tap the button below to cancel your subscription.
Do you want to delete the OurGroceries account for %s and all of its lists? Everyone signed in to this account will lose their lists.
This deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.
Your OurGroceries account was not found.
You can support us in the future by allowing ads in %s.
Update your privacy and consent choices
Someone in your household tapped “Add to List” on an ad for this item
Added %s from the ad you just tapped
Keep screen open to add multiple items
Are you sure you want to delete category “%s”? All items in this category will be uncategorized.
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s from %2$s?
Are you sure you want to delete “%s”?
You are already signed in to the “%s” account.
The email address “%s” is not valid. Please correct it.
You tapped on an ad for %s.\nPick a shopping list to add them to
You tapped on an ad for %s.\nPick a shopping list to add it to
Sorry, cannot reach the app store
There was a problem adding an item. Please check your network connection and try again.
Ask me which category it belongs to
When adding an item with no category
When adding an item with no category
OurGroceries is automatically picking a category for each new item. Would you prefer to choose each item’s category yourself?
OurGroceries is automatically picking a category for each new item. Would you prefer to leave these items uncategorized?
OurGroceries is leaving each new item uncategorized. Would you prefer OurGroceries to automatically pick a category for each item?
Cannot reach server to look up barcode.
There is already a category named %s. Please choose a different name.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
A shortcut has been created on your home screen. Tap the Home button now to see it.
To add an item to this recipe
To add an item to this shopping list
Choose how to cross off list items
The setting Sort shopping list items is set to Alphabetically, which causes items in a category to always be listed alphabetically.\n\nChange it to By drag and drop if you want a custom ordering.
Safeguard your grocery lists by creating an OurGroceries account. Then share your lists with your family, edit them on our website, and restore them after getting a new phone.
Cannot take a photo at this time. If your phone is connected to your computer, please disconnect it.
Cannot take a photo at this time, please try again later.
Extend delay before the screen automatically turns off while shopping
Choose how crossed-off items are grouped
Choose how the list of remembered items is grouped
Get rid of ads for your whole household and support development!
To share your lists, you need an OurGroceries account. You can create a new account or sign in to an existing one.
Please ask %s to invite you again.
Do you want to sign in as %s?
Do you want to switch accounts to %s?
There was a problem with your invitation. You will need to be invited again.
Hi, I’m using an app called OurGroceries. If you’d like to share shopping lists with me then tap this link to sign in to my OurGroceries account:\n\n%s
You are now signed in as %s.
You’re invited to sign in to my OurGroceries account
Uncheck an item to skip adding it.
You will be asked to pick a shopping list for each item you select.
Tap %s to add notes and links to this recipe.
Tap %s to add notes and links to this shopping list.
Added ingredients for %1$s to %2$d shopping lists
There is already a shopping list named %s. Please choose a different name.
There is already a recipe named %s. Please choose a different name.
Press & hold item to cross it off. (You can change this in Settings.)
Press & hold row to delete all crossed-off items. (You can change this in Settings.)
Press & hold item to uncross it off. (You can change this in Settings.)
No shopping lists or recipes matched your search.
There are no items in this recipe. Tap the button below to add one.
There are no items in this shopping list. Tap the button below to add one.
There are no items to add
Swipe item to cross it off. (You can change this in Settings.)
Swipe item to uncross it off. (You can change this in Settings.)
Disable automatic screen rotation when device is tilted
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Couldn’t download the barcode-scanning software. Please make sure you have an internet connection and that you have the Google Play Services app installed.
Downloading the software for scanning barcodes. This may take a few minutes.
Start date selection: %1$s – End date selection: %2$s
Tap to switch to Calendar view
Tap to switch to year view
When you sign in to a different OurGroceries account.
Allow app to send you notifications?
Thanks for your interest.\nWe will share more once you\'re back online.
You are back online! Let\'s pick up where we left off
You are back online! Continue learning about %s
We\'ll send you a notification with a link to the advertiser site.
Open ad when you\'re back online.

OurGroceries can share advertising identifiers and other data so that advertisers can show personalized ads. Turning off personalized ads will make them less relevant to you but won’t reduce how many are shown.
You’ve denied OurGroceries permission to take pictures. Without this permission, OurGroceries cannot take a photo of your item.
OurGroceries needs your permission to take pictures so that it can take a photo of your item.

You’ve denied OurGroceries permission to take pictures. Without this permission, OurGroceries cannot take a photo of your item.\n\nTo fix this, tap “Settings” below, tap “Permissions”, then give OurGroceries the “Camera” permission.
You’ve denied OurGroceries permission to access photos on your device. Without this permission, OurGroceries cannot take a photo of your item.
OurGroceries needs permission to access photos on your device so that it can take a photo of your item.

You’ve denied OurGroceries permission to access photos on your device. Without this permission, OurGroceries cannot take a photo of your item.\n\nTo fix this, tap “Settings” below, tap “Permissions”, then give OurGroceries the “Storage” permission.
The easiest app to share your family grocery list and simplify grocery shopping!
We’ve clarified and updated our privacy policy. It is available on our website.
If you find OurGroceries useful, please help us by rating it. Thank you!
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Speak aloud the items scanned from their barcodes
Invite family or friends to share an OurGroceries account
Invite family or friends to sign in to your OurGroceries account
The shopping list “%s” no longer exists.
Show on-screen keyboard automatically when adding an item
Show additional items below your own
It looks like your household isn’t using categories to organize your lists, so the app will no longer ask you to categorize new items. You can change this in OurGroceries Settings.
It looks like your household isn’t using categories to organize your lists, so the app will no longer suggest categories for new items automatically. You can change this in OurGroceries Settings.
It looks like your household uses categories to organize your lists, so the app will pick categories for new items automatically. You can change this in OurGroceries Settings.
Do you want to copy the lists from %1$s into the account for %2$s?\n\nEither way they’ll still be available in the %1$s account.
You can delete your OurGroceries account and all of its lists. Everyone signed in to your account will lose their lists.
Please enter the email address you use for your OurGroceries account.\n\nUse one account for your household.
If you don’t have an OurGroceries account yet, enter your email address above and we’ll get you set up.
The password you entered is not correct for this account. Please try again.

You’re signed in!

The lists from %1$s have been copied to the account for %2$s.

They are also still available in the old account.
You’re signed in!\n\nYour existing lists have been copied to the OurGroceries account for %s.
Your account didn’t have a password, so we’ve sent an email to your %s email account with a link to reset your password.\n\nPlease check that email account now.
An email has been sent to %s. You must click the link in that email to approve this sign-in.\n\nPlease check that email account now.
You’re signed in!\n\nThe lists from %s are still available in that account.
You are now signed in to your OurGroceries account. You can use it to share your lists with others, see your lists on the OurGroceries website, or connect a voice assistant like Amazon Alexa.
We’ve sent an email to your %s email account with a link to reset your password.\n\nPlease check that email account now.
We can send you an email that signs you in automatically.
Create a new account for %s.\n\nNew OurGroceries password:
Choose how crossed-off items are ordered
Choose how the list of remembered items is ordered
Choose how the top-level list of lists is ordered
Choose how shopping list items are ordered
You’ve got a Remove Ads lifetime purchase, but you’re still paying for a Remove Ads subscription.
You’ve got Play Pass, but you’re still paying for an OurGroceries subscription.

Your lists may be out of date. Try:

• Turning off airplane mode.
• Turning on mobile data or Wi-Fi.
• Checking the signal in your area.
You are now signed into account %s
Picks a light or dark theme automatically
Your list is always up to date and always with you
Use on anyone’s phone, and see updates instantly—even while shopping!
Shop with your phone or watch, and use Alexa to add items easily
Just tap to add a recipe’s ingredients to your grocery list
Pick a shopping list, add grocery items to plan your trip, then tap to cross them off while shopping
Get rid of ads for your whole household!
You’ve paid to remove ads for your whole household!
You’ve paid to remove ads for your whole household!
Removing ads keeps your lists and sharing intact.
Free trials will be charged the selected price after 7 days. You may cancel your free trial at any time before it expires to avoid charges by going to your Google Play account subscription settings.
If you enjoy OurGroceries, get rid of ads for your whole household and support development!
Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy ad-free OurGroceries!
You’ve canceled the monthly plan, but OurGroceries will still be free of ads until the current subscription period ends. Resubscribe to continue enjoying OurGroceries ad-free!
You’re currently on the %s per month plan.
You’re currently on the monthly plan.
One of the devices signed into your OurGroceries account has removed ads, so you’re all set! Enjoy ad-free OurGroceries!
You’ve canceled the yearly plan, but OurGroceries will still be free of ads until the current subscription period ends. Resubscribe to continue enjoying OurGroceries ad-free!
You’re currently on the %s per year plan.
You’re currently on the yearly plan.

If you had previously removed ads from OurGroceries, then you might have done so by buying the separate OurGroceries Key app. Tap the button below to find out. If you get an error, then you didn’t buy the Key. If you see a listing for the Key, then install it again (for free) to remove ads.
Purchases will be charged immediately when made. You may cancel subscription purchases at any time by going to your Google Play account subscription settings.
The Play Store app is not available on this phone.
Unfortunately purchases are not available right now. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy ad-free OurGroceries!
If you enjoy OurGroceries, get rid of ads for your whole household and support development!
